message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product.  I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $18,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $15,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $18,000 is really my bottom line. This product is in high demand, and I know its value.  I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
